name: "Chess-Checkers" Game Tray - KIFU PARIS
description: The KIFU PARIS Chess/Chequers Game Tray is the ultimate luxury game. Accented with a mixture of shagreen, pen shell and bronze-patina brass this piece comes with all game parts in a velvet pouch. Available in a light or dark color-way. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade. Shagreen/Pen Shell, Bronze-Patina Brass.
